content: this is my conference pear crochet pattern this pattern comes with both us and uk crochet versions all my patterns also come with a detailed help document to remind you how to complete each stitch and many other techniques all my patterns are written in english the finished size is about 10cm 4in tall though this will change depending on how tight you crochet and what hook is used i recommend using a 3 5mm e/4 size hook with dk weight yarn skill level beginner - basic knowledge required you need to know the following stitches to make this pattern - chain chain - single_crochet single_crochet uk double_crochet - increase increase - decrease decrease - slip_stitch slip_stitch a brief description of how to do each stitch is given in the help sheet but this may be difficult for a complete beginner to understand materials required green dk yarn - about 7g brown dk yarn - about 1g toy stuffing do not redistribute sell or claim this pattern whole or in part as your own you may sell finished items handmade by you in limited quantities but you must credit myqueergifts as the designer this pattern will be available as a pdf for download instantly after your payment
